title: Deposit Interest Rate in Ghana
description: Deposit Interest Rate in Ghana remained unchanged at 11.50 percent in the third quarter of 2022 from 11.50 percent in the second quarter of 2022. Deposit Interest Rate in Ghana averaged 16.47 percent from 1978 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 36.02 percent in the fourth quarter of 1997 and a record low of 7.58 percent in the fourth quarter of 2006. The Deposit Interest Rate is the average rate paid by commercial banks to individuals or corporations on deposits. This page includes a chart with historical data for Deposit Interest Rate in Ghana.
author: IMF
